metadata.title: Lemon Rice Recipe- Popular South Indian Recipe- Refreshing & Comforting
metadata.description:
Lemon Rice: A South Indian vegetarian delicacy, often served for lunch along with pickle and yogurt. It’s a comfort food for many South Indians, lemon juice imparts a slight tartness to the rice and the seasonings make the rice taste delicious.

Recipe: https://bit.ly/3C27Fo3

transcription: [00:00.000] Gather cooked rice, oil, mustard seeds, dals, peanuts, curry leaves and green chilies.
[00:10.000] Place a pan over medium heat and add 2 tbsp oil.
[00:20.000] When oil is hot, add mustard seeds and let them splutter.
[00:30.000] Add chana dal and urad dal, sauté till golden brown.
[00:40.000] Add peanuts and curry leaves, sauté for a few seconds.
[00:50.000] Add slit green chilies and ¼ tsp turmeric powder, mix well.
[01:00.000] Add the cooked rice to the pan and combine with the tempering.
[01:20.000] Drizzle lemon juice over the rice and fold gently.
[01:30.000] Sprinkle chopped cilantro and combine well.
[01:40.000] Taste and adjust lemon or salt if needed.
[01:50.000] Remove from heat and serve warm with pickle and yogurt.
[02:00.000] Enjoy refreshing and comforting South Indian lemon rice.
[02:10.000] A perfect meal for lunch or as a side dish!
